subject: Re: Shaw Alphabet Books is now online.
msgSnippet: ... OK, that makes sense. And here I thought I would be making it MORE visible by making it dark. I figured with a super bright background it would cause
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, Nathan Sharfi <bonusfrogs@...> wrote:

> If your monitor doesn't do contrast well it'd seem as if the two
> covers aren't showing up; they're both dark gray illustrations on a
> black backgroundand the page background itself is pure black, too.

OK, that makes sense. And here I thought I would be making it MORE visible by making it dark. I figured with a super bright background it would cause retinal bleaching making the images harder to see, like filming someone in front of a bright background. I guess my choice had the opposite of my intended effect. D'oh... Oh well. At least I know about that for any future updates.
